#BlackMagicCraft #Episode103

This episode I build an imposing iron door for Dungeons & Dragons. This "boss door" can find use in almost any game. Be sure to grab the free template, it's pay what you want if you'd like to donate to the channel.

üìúFREE TEMPLATE: http://bit.ly/IronDoorTemplate
